statements: DELETE FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE supplier_id = 100 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM waste_reduction_initiatives WHERE status = 'Approved' AND end_date >= '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM Initiative WHERE supplier_id = 1 AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_name = 'XYZ Corp';
DELETE FROM waste_reduction_logs WHERE supplier_id = 1 AND waste_reduction_date = '2022-01-20';
DELETE FROM Initiatives WHERE initiative_id = 100 AND supplier_id = 10;
DELETE FROM WasteReductionSuppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Company';
DELETE FROM WasteReductionSuppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'Eco Solutions'
